Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On October 23, 2023, JPMorgan Chase & Co. closed public offerings of (i) $2,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2027 (the “2027 Notes”) and (ii) $2,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2029 (the “2029 Notes”) and $3,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2034 (the “2034 Notes” and, together with the 2027 Notes and the 2029 Notes, the “Notes”). The Notes were registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, pursuant to a registration statement on Form S-3(File No. 333-263304),as amended. In connection with these offerings, the legal opinion as to the legality of the 2027 Notes is being filed as Exhibit 5.1 to this report and the legal opinion as to the legality of the 2029 Notes and 2034 Notes is being filed as Exhibit 5.2 to this report.
